# Total Downloader

> Canonical: https://josealvarezdev.github.io/Total_Downloader/

## Summary
Total Downloader is a web application for downloading video or audio from supported URLs.

## Main URL
- [Home](https://josealvarezdev.github.io/Total_Downloader/): Main app page.

- [GitHub repository](https://github.com/JoseAlvarezDev/Total_Downloader)
- [Support on Ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/josealvarezdev)
